Text: Re Fwd New Commodity Marketplace Opportunity Cc Lay Again thank you for listening to my concept In my search for cofooundercollaborators and angel investors disclosing the concept for lack of a better title now I call the system LifeTrak and formulating a simple clear picture is not easy The attached schematic depicts an overview of the effort Part of the diagram hopes to separate the special interests as participants and member organizations so as to be helpful in the public sector with social issues The groups fall into two natural sectors supply generators and userservice organizations In the middle is the system and its management that interconnects those benefiting groups and the donorrecipient LifeTrak cardholders I can embellish more on these later The diagram gives us a place to begin discuss and talking points in order to try to simplify how the concept could be developed and supported and where the revenue model which creates dramatic efficiencies generates management and license fee I hope we can get together soon Although Vince Kaminski cannot directly contribute due to his other commitments I have copied him to keep him advised hoping that he might be able to do more at a later date Best regards Al Arfsten wrote I did understand that you were still at the concept stage It is a very interesting proposal and I would like to think about it Thanks Mark Original Message From Al Arfsten ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAlArfstenCarfstenbflassociatesEcomEENRON ENRONcom Sent Thursday January AM To Lay Mark Subject Fwd New Commodity Marketplace Opportunity Mark Per our brief conversation this morning the attached email was sent to you yesterday I hope that you might understand that I am conceptually looking for founders and at the pre business plan stage There is an enormous problem existing with a very attractive economic reward and willing participants needing this solution I need help Al Arfsten ContentTransferEncoding bit XMozillaStatus MessageID Date Wed Jan From Al Arfsten Organization BFL Associates Ltd XMailer Mozilla enCCCKMCD NSCPCD Win I XAcceptLanguage en MIMEVersion To Subject New Commodity Marketplace Opportunity ContentType textplain charsetusascii Mark Lay I shared confidentially with Vince Kaminski my developing concept of a highly inefficient notforprofit enterprise with dramatically increasing costs I believe that a forprofit economic model is possible that should reverse these skyrocketing costs and ultimately lower the commodity thereby having a national if not global impact of health care costs Vince seems to also believe in the concepts potential The CEO of one of the biggest US blood banks has already asked to become involved I would like involve more people with vision means and desire to help make this a reality I would look forward to meeting with you to talk further Al Arfsten LifeTrak Vision Chart doc

Mark LayMark had not received my email so simply assumed that I had a business plan and he would help if he could I explained that I was at the pre business plan stage Further that I had hoped to discuss my search for collaborators to become cofounders People with vision that might help develop and refine the concept identify model components isolate modules for the initial effort and build a business plan suitable for angel investors not VCs I might need your help in conveying this to him I have struggled to put on paper a very rough draft of how it might be best describe as to the direction it might go and what might conceptually be possible Please look at this and tell me if I am going too far at this point I do not want to implant insurmountable obstacle in anyones mind I hope to hear from you Al Arfsten LifeTrak Concept doc

Fwd New Commodity Marketplace OpportunityPer our brief conversation this morning the attached email was sent to you yesterday I hope that you might understand that I am conceptually looking for founders and at the pre business plan stage There is an enormous problem existing with a very attractive economic reward and willing participants needing this solution I need help Al Arfsten ContentTransferEncoding bit XMozillaStatus MessageID Date Wed Jan From Al Arfsten Organization BFL Associates Ltd XMailer Mozilla enCCCKMCD NSCPCD Win I XAcceptLanguage en MIMEVersion To Subject New Commodity Marketplace Opportunity ContentType textplain charsetusascii Mark Lay I shared confidentially with Vince Kaminski my developing concept of a highly inefficient notforprofit enterprise with dramatically increasing costs I believe that a forprofit economic model is possible that should reverse these skyrocketing costs and ultimately lower the commodity thereby having a national if not global impact of health care costs Vince seems to also believe in the concepts potential The CEO of one of the biggest US blood banks has already asked to become involved I would like involve more people with vision means and desire to help make this a reality I would look forward to meeting with you to talk further Al Arfsten

New Commodity Marketplace OpportunityLay I shared confidentially with Vince Kaminski my developing concept of a highly inefficient notforprofit enterprise with dramatically increasing costs I believe that a forprofit economic model is possible that should reverse these skyrocketing costs and ultimately lower the commodity thereby having a national if not global impact of health care costs Vince seems to also believe in the concepts potential The CEO of one of the biggest US blood banks has already asked to become involved I would like involve more people with vision means and desire to help make this a reality I would look forward to meeting with you to talk further Al Arfsten

Collaborative EffortI am very enthusiastic about your interest and possible contributions towards a nd Century human blood system I have attached a letter that discusses the endeavor Please note that it has a builtin automatic release in the event you need to terminate It has a confidentiality statement as well If it is acceptable please sign it and fax it back to me at at your earliest convenience Al Arfsten Kaminski Acceptance doc
Stinson ListVince We are trying to accelerate the Coral response at the earliest time possible I look forward to receiving from Stinson Gibner the contact list you mentioned Regards Al

Fw Change Mtg Date Cc Vince Bjorn must be in Chicago Wednesday so we must move the meeting to Tuesday or Thursday if that is possible Otherwise give me other possibilities Thanks Al Original Message From Al Arfsten To Cc Sent Tuesday November AM Subject Re Meeting next week Vince That works for us at the Hyatt Regency at am The earlier the better on the Plan See you soon Al Original Message From To Sent Tuesday November AM Subject Meeting next week Al What about meeting Stinson on Wednesday next week after Thanksgiving at am Hyatt Regency We should be able to Email you the business plan outline the day before Have a Happy Thanksgiving Vince

Re Change Mtg Date Cc Vince We will see you and Stinson at am at the Hyatt on Thursday Al Original Message From To Sent Monday November AM Subject RE Change Mtg Date Al Thursday would work for me Vince Original Message From Al Arfsten ENRON Sent Monday November AM To Cc Subject Fw Change Mtg Date Vince Bjorn must be in Chicago Wednesday so we must move the meeting to Tuesday or Thursday if that is possible Otherwise give me other possibilities Thanks Al Original Message From Al Arfsten File mailto To File mailto Cc File mailto Sent Tuesday November AM Subject Re Meeting next week Vince That works for us at the Hyatt Regency at am The earlier the better on the Plan See you soon Al Original Message From File mailto To File mailto Sent Tuesday November AM Subject Meeting next week Al What about meeting Stinson on Wednesday next week after Thanksgiving at am Hyatt Regency We should be able to Email you the business plan outline the day before Have a Happy Thanksgiving Vince This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by other s is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
Troubled WatersVince I look forward to our next breakfast chat Best regards Al Arfsten

Re Troubled WatersVince Why dont we meet for breakfast at or am at the usual place next Tuesday the th AL wrote Al Look forward to meeting you Next week Monday through Wednesday would work for me I shall be traveling for the rest of that week Vince Original Message From Al Arfsten ENRON Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject Troubled Waters Vince I look forward to our next breakfast chat Best regards Al Arfsten This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
Coral AgmtVince Please ask Stinson how we are to obtain the other signatures now that we have your signature on the document We will try to move things along with Coral ASAP Regards Al

Breakfast Cc Vince I have returned from the west coast and would hope that you and I could meet for breakfast or lunch at your earliest convenience Either the Hyatt or elsewhere is fine with me Regards Al Arfsten

Re Breakfast Cc Vince I will plan on next Wednesday and will see you at am at the Hyatt unless lunch works better for you Regards Al Arfsten Original Message From To Sent Thursday December PM Subject Re Breakfast Al Next Wednesday would work for me Also I shall fax you my nonsolicitation agreement for Coral tonight Vince

Collaborative EffortI am very enthusiastic about your interest and possible contributions towards a nd Century human blood system I have attached a letter that discusses the endeavor Please note that it has a builtin automatic release in the event you need to terminate It has a confidentiality statement as well If it is acceptable please sign it and fax it back to me at at your earliest convenience Al Arfsten Kaminski Acceptance doc
